website_summaries.verdict: This is a good set for recreational play and youngsters learning to pitch, but masters of the game probably won't enjoy playing with rubber horseshoes.
pros: Affordable, entry-level set that's suitable for players who don't want to use heavy, metal horseshoes, as these are crafted with rubber
cons: Not heavy enough for competitive players
The stakes are somewhat flimsy and don't hold up nearly as well as those made of metal

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: You really need to buy metal stakes to use these horseshoes. While they are made out of plastic and much lighter than regular horseshoes, they are still rather heavy. The plastic outdoor post and the smaller plastic indoor post with mat are just not strong enough to stay in place when thrown from proper distance. I loved the idea of playing indoors without risk of causing damage but I'm not in love. If you want a lightweight set of horseshoes for the beach or lawn play, as I said, buy metal stakes and these are truly a great alternative. Please click YES if you think my review helped you decide whether or not to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual fun
customer_reviews.text: I have no desire to play official horseshoes. When we go family camping I just wanted to toss some horseshoes. These are a heavy rubber / plastic, which is fine by me. I use two pieces of rebar and put a beer can empty on top. "Ringers" make the can ring, 2 points. Ones that land inside the box I draw around the rebar with my boot in the sand, 1 point. The plastic bar things included are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cheap plastic...
customer_reviews.text: My husband called this set a piece of junk, the base falls over when the horseshoes hit it. The best thing in this kit is the horseshoes, they are pretty sturdy, everything else feels like cheap plastic. So disappointed, I bought this for my RV trips for the kids, don't waste your money, buy a decent set.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: If you like the smell of gasoline and petroleum, you will love this product!
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible smelling. They have a very strong gasoline petroleum type odor. I have left them outdoors for several days hoping this might disseminate it. No such luck. Trust me, no sane person will ever use these indoors.....
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a camping trip, but we were unable to use them. The red stakes are meant for outdoor use, but they were cheap, hollow plastic. The yellow stakes are for indoor use and seemed a little more sturdy than the outdoor stakes. Neither of them really held up to the weight of the horseshoes, and that is with an 8 and 10 year old throwing the horseshoes. Spend a little more money and get something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: GaRN

customer_reviews.title: He loves horseshoes and this set is perfect since it can be used indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set my my 15 year old disabled son. He loves horseshoes and this set is perfect since it can be used indoors and out. The shoes are a harder rubber-ish material and do clunk quite a bit on my hardwood floors, but no damage. Great set for a great price and the fact that it can be set up indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Horrific toxic chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: If this wasn't made of toxic smelling plastic from China it would be great. Officially the worst smelling product I've ever bought. Not a normal plastic smell either. We tried airing them out by leaving them ouside for a few weeks but it's still so bad we can't bring them into the house. We immediately wash our hands after handling them because the smell/chemicals transfers, who knows what we're being exposed to. Unfortunate because the game is a great idea! I thought they might air out but should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jen3

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was expecting with this horse shoe game , but sadly I was disappointed. The yellow stick in the center of the round disc part that is supposed to catch the horse shoe is extremely loose and wobbly. The whole thing falls over every time we attempted to make a shot where the horse shoe landed on the base with the stick. It was frustrating and disappointing trying to play properly with it. Highly recommend NOT buying this. Go with something more sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cwissy

customer_reviews.title: Not quality rubber but plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are not rubber they are plastic. The add says quality rubber. These are not rubber horse shoes but cheaply made bargain store plastic. The pictures you see are correct but the words you read in the description are untrue.
customer_reviews.author: ProBuilder

customer_reviews.title: Great little set for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: it’s a neat set of lawn games. The colors make it interesting. The spikes hold, the pads might save some of the yard and the shoes are balanced well. Dislikes: wish it came with a case or sturdy nylon bag to store set in. The shoes are pretty light but this is a plastic kit so they seem appropriate for intended use for children. I recommend setting it up with spikes much closer together than a steel set.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Not good for adult play unless you use the outdoor, stake in the ground method.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived when expected. The ring to support the post is rather flimsey, but works with the younger children. When adults play, it needs to be staked into the ground to make it more sturdy. Even then, some of the stronger men knocked it sideways. It works well for my little children, indoors or out, but I would buy a "real" set next time for the adults.
customer_reviews.author: don-d-lite

customer_reviews.title: All horseshoes the same color
customer_reviews.text: Horrible my kid was all excited to play horseshoes got the box open dumped it all out on the yard and all 4 horseshoes were blue. How are you supposed to know who scored what with both setsbof shoes being blue. Ill be returning this. How awful
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoes good, stakes/spikes garbage
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoes are a good weight, given that they are plastic/rubber. However both variations of the stakes are useless. The plastic spikes are hollow and bend instead driving into the ground. The stakes and rubber ring mats are too light and the shoes knock them over. This means that you can't use these without some other spike/stake. Kept the shoes for kids usage with another set and stakes, and threw away the rest of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They did the job but they are pretty cheaply made and don't feel like the "real horseshoe" game by any means.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for my niece and nephew for Easter. For a 5 and an 8 year old, they were "fine" ... but they are really light (the horse shoes have no weight to them) and the stands don't stay put (just a thin piece of rubber with a piece of plastic for the stand. I know you get what you pay for ... but these weren't "that" cheap and they feel like playschool toys for young kids. If they weren't gifts, I would have returned both sets.
customer_reviews.author: Summers GirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Champion Sports Rubber Horseshoe Set fun to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Champion Sports Rubber Horseshoe Set to take on a road trip to our daughter's house. It was easy to set up and fun to use, as a spur of the moment activity. It is easy to tuck it into a space in our over packed vehicle. Kinda a hokey set up, but durable enough for a portable game. Don't expect it to last forever around kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sande

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoes are hard plastic!
customer_reviews.text: We expected the shoes to be much more rubbery, like the ones we grew up with. We have hardwood floors and were hoping to be able to play indoors with the grand children. The heavy, plastic shoes make it very loud and I worry about denting the floors. Outdoor posts are way too flimsy for the weight of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gyrogirl

customer_reviews.title: The horseshoes are very light and allow a short throwing ...
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoes are very light and allow a short throwing range (maybe 10-15 feet at most) for any level of accuracy. This would be more ideal for children. When attempting to return the package, I was offered only shipping options ranging from $9.00 to $15.00 (obviously, the latter option would have costed as much as the product itself). Will keep product as a result, but it will unfortunately sit perpetually on a shelf or be donated at first chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoes are heavy weight & decently made. The spikes are hollow thin plastic. The bases is also thin & flimsy but works. We use when traveling in our RV so we didn't want something heavy like original metal. Overall, it is great for the price and works ok for the times we want to play.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Need Modification
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoes are great in colors and durability. The actual pins and mats are flimsy and fall over each time you get close with the horseshoes. My hubby had to stake in metal pins (about 1 ft. high) and place through the mat hole into the ground. Now they stay stationary and it is fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd R King

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic stakes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for camping. The horseshoes are a good weight and light enough for kids, but weighty enough for adults to play with as well. However, the red plastic stakes are pretty cheap and when we tried to push them into the ground, they bent, and then we tried to gently pound them in with a rubber mallet and they folded in half and now they can't be used. I think I'll just go to Lowes or HD and get some sort of garden stake instead so we can continue to use the horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great
customer_reviews.text: The bright colors make it easy to find the shoes in the grass. Not too heavy and not too light. The stake wasn’t easy to get into our very hard rocky soil. But that’s more on our yard than the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Liz Guilbeau

customer_reviews.title: Possibilities of fun, but not worth the hassle of the low quality of materials.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not durable/steady enough for outside use. Using a rubber mallet to put the stakes into the grass damaged the top portion of both stakes "WITH CARE BEING APPLIED WHEN DOING SO"
customer_reviews.author: Dezz Adams

customer_reviews.title: Super portable & kid/family friendly FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: My siblings and I grew up playing with real horse shoes. However we’ve got children of younger ages between three and eight but I don’t quite trust with the horseshoe LOL! I bought this as an alternative to introduce them to the game/sport and they absolutely loved it! My sisters and I also had a great time introducing them, and I can’t wait till they’re bigger and we’ve got the space for some real horseshoes!
customer_reviews.author: calissta

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: The light weight, plastic construction and choice of bases makes this a good toy. The ability to use the pegs with the big rubber base indoors if the weather is bad makes it very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor/Outdoor Game
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandsons! They love it! It can be used indoors, outdoors and even on the beach. Very good quality and sturdy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Plastic NOT rubber
customer_reviews.text: The description says rubber horseshoes, the box came & everything is plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: But my kids love them
customer_reviews.text: The poles could be taller and the pole holders wouldn't slide when hit,if the pole bottoms were heavier. Finally the shoes are getting damaged quickly-should be more durable-maybe more rubber,than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: nick fedore

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: They're okay... The pole for the horseshoes is pretty flimsy and the rubber mat that holds it down is pretty useless. I guess it might work if you buried it in the sand at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: It works great at the beach and in the back yard. the rubber base holds up well. We even took them with us to a friends BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Great to take to lake or camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought to take to the lake and it is great for that purpose! Very enjoyable game to play with the grandkids..we play every year at the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Peters

customer_reviews.title: Toys not for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing but toys. The outdoors stakes are cheap hollow plastic that split when driving into the ground. The indoor stakes are short and couldn't stop a shoe from 5 feet away. These are no way ment for real horse shoe games. Maybe a good toy for kids to learn how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: The Champion Sports Rubber Horseshoe Set was very good for the reasonable price. It had a very strong rubber odor at first which remained for quite awhile. The set is being used in an elderly facility and works well. For the price it works very well. The only problem is that the bottom plate which holds the peg vertically sometimes pops off when a ringer is made. We have considered making a wooden bottom for the peg holder, but then it would no longer fit into the box for storage. These are minor problems for something that comes out occasionally and is nice to have around for the limited physical ability of the users.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but content does not match color
customer_reviews.text: Kids love playing with it. Only issue is all horseshoe came in one red color, not 2 blue and 2 red as advertised on box. So not ideal for teams, we would have to mark to differentiate and not impossible just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Littletreats

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the beach or the backyard but there were two drawbacks. The first I was aware of and that is there are only four horseshoes (two of each color). I would prefer being charged a little more and add two additional horseshoes for each color (like a regular regulation set). The second is that the stakes for the outside aren't wood but plastic and they're bendable. The first time I used the set my two year old grandson bent both of them easily. I would think that if Champion is making this set for kids to use they would make the stakes more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marcino

customer_reviews.title: The smell is completely noxious
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for horseshoes on the beach and thought since these were made of rubber, they would be decent. They are pretty heavy, which is okay, but they stink so bad, I don't know if anyone will want to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this rubber horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: My family plays horseshoe's quite often in the summer. We have an adult set and the kids always want to play. The horseshoe's are just too heavy for them. Bought this set so that my children could play. They love it! As do I! We play in the backyard with this set all the time. You can also play indoors which is an added bonus for rainy days! These rubber horseshoe's have a good weight to them. Not super light like the other cheap plastic ones we've tried before.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: great for the park and camping
customer_reviews.text: love this horseshoe set. Use it to go camping and just at the park play with outings. no need for metal and heavy horeshoes. it does have a strong chemical or rubber or tar smell like other reviewers noted but I just let it sit outside in the sun for a few days, smell mostly gone. I use two short about 1 feet rebar and jam it through the grass stakes so now I can just hammer it into the grown. the other one with the round black rubber mats are great for on cement, does tip over but can be weight down.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Plastic posts are useless
customer_reviews.text: Plastic posts are useless. Horseshoes knock them over or bend them if the shoe hits it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Gapusan

customer_reviews.title: Could be weighted a bit more
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the grandkids it works well but the base could have been a bit heavier but it works they like it and thats what counts
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well worth the money -5 star
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality materials, a great choice to make to purchase. Bought it for my grandkids, so they can play with it inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaDotson

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe in the house
customer_reviews.text: I am using this mainly for indoor fun. Feels cheap but yeah you can have fun with it
customer_reviews.author: Prayogk

customer_reviews.title: Ok for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for kids. Simulates the real thing for adults. Not a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to use this on a pool deck!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to set this up on our pool deck instead of having to put stakes in the ground and play out in the yard!
customer_reviews.author: S.K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY HORSESHOE SET
customer_reviews.text: This item was given to our grandson for Christmas so we have no idea how it will perform outside, but so far with using it in the house it has been okay. Once this set is used in both ways we will be able to update this review with more accurate information. It seems sturdy enough and has a good feel to the horseshoes itself but hard to play indoors without fear of damaging walls, etc. So far it has been enjoyed as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor game!
customer_reviews.text: Played this in the yard after watching the Kentucky Derby! ONLY thing I wish the outdoor stakes were a bit more solid. Ground was hard and you can't hammer on them. Shoes themselves were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters are having a great time with this item. Something for backyard play.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Throwback to childhood
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones we used to play with when we were kids and now our kids and their friends are having fun with it out in the yard. well made for the price, seems durable
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Champion Sports Rubber Horseshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: You cannot miss with this game. Everyone loves to try their hand at the horseshoe toss. This game is much safter than the original which comes with iron shoes and an iron base. The plastic is slightly weighted for tossing and it is safe for young ones. You also have the opportunity to place the bases as far apart or as near as you choose depending on the talent or age group. I bought this one for my family reunion coming up in July. I expect the kids to be busy with this one from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Ok but I was looking for a more sturdy base
customer_reviews.text: Ok but I was looking for a more sturdy base. This works but it does bend up and is a little lighter and more flexible than I want. Would not stand up to lots of play.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun and not as dangerous as metal horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: We are a big fan of lawn games and bought these instead of metal horseshoes because we often have kids in the yard and were worried about a metal horseshoe causing an accident. This is a great set of horseshoes and they are heavy enough that you can feel the balance of them when you toss them, but not so heavy that they will crack a skull open. The pins stay in the base well. The only con I can think of is they had a pretty strong rubber smell when we first got them, but they stay in the garage when not in use, so it really isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT buy again in future
customer_reviews.text: I bought because I read in multiple comments that the horseshoes had some weight to them and were of good quality based on the price. These were super light, were made of light plastic, and bounced when thrown. These are not made of rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids. VERY HARD YO GET HURT WITH THIS. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Passero

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, as this is everyone's favorite gameroom game. However, had to make some adjustments because they were not strong enough for adult use. After, gorilla gluing nordic stove top plates to the bottom of the rubber mats and inserting a screw into the yellow post, these work amazingly now. Would also recommend putting foam mat pieces around your wall, as these will damage the wall, if hit.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for Inside
customer_reviews.text: We set this up at our indoor wedding reception. The stands hold firm so people can play the game as you would on an outside set.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and the neighborhood kids love this adult game in kids size!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for the price. The yellow poles that ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price. The yellow poles that go with the black mats are decent, but they do sway a little when hit by the horseshoe. The red poles are not the strongest, so be careful putting them in the ground. It is eaiser to twist them into the ground, instead of trying to hammer or push from the top, as they will split.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Martin

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Horseshore Set
customer_reviews.text: This rubber Horseshoe set is well made. My grandchildren love it. I recommend it that it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Ann Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Horseshoes have a reasonable heft and set is good for both indoor and outdoor use
customer_reviews.author: 10smom

customer_reviews.title: Great product very well maded well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea indoor out door I got them to play with my grandson and they are really made well. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: These don't work well. The posts fall right over. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor set!
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is not too flimsy, nor is it too hard. Perfect for indoor games. It will be an activity at my son's birthday party. (With adults supervising!)
customer_reviews.author: crissibeth17Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just for fun
customer_reviews.text: Not as they used to be. Not real horseshoes of course.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable,  but okay
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, but met our needs for a few parties. I would swap out the plastic stakes for metal.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Bossler

customer_reviews.title: Rubber horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: Kids liked then. Not so much the older adults. But my Lawn LOVED them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap weightless plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, weightless plastic really doesn’t throw well. Way to lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: bluemoon52

customer_reviews.title: Equipment Missing very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these horseshoes and on box only contained ONE red horse shoe; had both the blue ones though. The other box had both red and blue horseshoes. I ordered these and planned on using them in my Lifetime Activity Lesson Plans with my middle school students...I am a PE teacher. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went with this product! I was throwing a going away party for friends and some of us have young children. It was so fun to play ourselves as well not having to worry when the kids wanted to have their turn. Super easy to set and take down and it helped to provide entertainment for both kids and adults. I can't wait to take it on our next camping adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy shoes
customer_reviews.text: While the rubber base is a bit light for the purpose they do their job. The long red stakes are useless for much of anything and I can't see them being hammered into anything but freshly tilled ground but the horseshoes themselves are really well made and heavy enough to play a serious game. Overall I was very pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jo8

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The rod/pad needs to be on a hard flat surfice for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Randy A. Stratford

customer_reviews.title: Weak item
customer_reviews.text: Item is very flimsy and the grass stakes split in half after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: F. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to pass the time
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun playing on our camping trip. The ground was hard at our site so we tried the indoor mats which are useless and flimsy, instead chose to drive the plastic stakes in the ground...carefully because they are plastic. We may get another use out of the stakes before they break but all in all for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this toy was great. The odor that emitted from the box was very, very strong! The odor dissipated once the box was opened that is why the four stars.
customer_reviews.author: dldyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken/missing pieces reached out to company but never heard anything. Neat games for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoes are the perfect weight for kids, and I love that they are a heavy duty plastic instead of metal so I don't have to worry about any serious injuries. The poles and mats are a cheap plastic though and would bend or move too easily...that's why I only gave it 4 stars. I just replaced them with rebar and made an outdoor court that we throw on.
customer_reviews.author: Songluvsturtles

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fun picnic game!
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive and easy to use horseshoe set. I bought it for a summer picnic and everyone really enjoyed playing it. The outdoor stakes were a little difficult to get into the ground, even with a hammer, so we ended up just using the indoor ones. Overall, this is a really fun game to have on hand for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard game for young and old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game along with several others for a neighborhood pool party. The kids and adults really enjoyed it and had a great time. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TnTzmom245

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: The game was a hit at the cookout. Nice heavy horse shoes.
customer_reviews.author: L.B. 🐝

customer_reviews.title: Plastic pegs make this set unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the horseshoe set. The pegs were cheap, hollow plastic! I could not get the pegs into my yard - they kept bending. Also when the heavy horseshoe hit them the pegs came lose. I returned them. The red pegs should have been made of wood - which is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin-Retirement

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was not sturdy as hoped for. Plastic stakes did not easily go into the ground. Appropriate more for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: SIBBUM

customer_reviews.title: Great product but missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving one star is because the product was missing a piece, one of the pieces for indoor use. Luckily it comes with a set of stakes for outdoor use and I was getting it to use outdoors. And both of those stakes were there. Aside from missing an item. It was great and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis James-Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: That are okay. My complaint is I got 4 blue shoes. I was on vacation when we opened the box. So we used a marker to mark up one set. Would have been nice to get the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: BrAnDr1017

customer_reviews.title: Champion horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these because they can be played inside or out. Don't move easily when played inside, so this is a plus. No strong rubber odor which is important to me. Enjoyed by kids and parents!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Stolworthy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These horseshoes are about anything you could want for use by younger folks or those who don't wish to toss 2 and 1/2 pound steel shoes. It is a complete set for use on any surface and is entirely portable. Other user comments about a strong petroleum odor have apparently been addressed, as I could detect no smell at all right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: timeout

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy or easy to use as another set we used at a friends house. I was disappointed this wasn't the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: BecMac2015

customer_reviews.title: Great sport for the office morale.
customer_reviews.text: Great office toy. We play weekly in the hallway and people love it. Amazing morale boost.
customer_reviews.author: R U A DAD?

customer_reviews.title: Item came as pictured. The horse shoes are hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came as pictured. The horse shoes are hard plastic and appear to be very durable and weighted well. The only problem I had was one of the indoor spikes came without the holder for the piece of yellow plastic. This means we only have one spike for indoors. We will make it work over dealing with the process of sending the item back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This worked OK mainly for kids. I won;t plan on using it with adults. Just too light and not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap... don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoes themselves are decent quality but the stakes (including the indoor ones and the supposed "outdoor" ones) are very flimsy and don't make a good stake to throw the horseshoes around. The red outdoor stakes are so flimsy that you could barely even push them into soft grass.
customer_reviews.author: MeganH

customer_reviews.title: Moves too much
customer_reviews.text: Bought for kids and a quick set up for adults however no matter how lightly you throw the pole with the rubber disk moves or slides even in the grass. I was expecting heavier rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they look great, and will be easy to transport when going ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't been able to play this yet, but they look great, and will be easy to transport when going camping!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Braithwaite

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would be fun, didn't work out well though
customer_reviews.text: This was okay, it wasn't easy to keep the posts up though. Eventually, we gave up. It was kind of a bummer for our trip. Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MFamily2003

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience of a travel friendly horseshoe game but the horseshoes just don’t have enough weight and the posts don’t stay up or handle the horseshoe hitting them.
customer_reviews.author: Awhite

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper set, it was great for our so s birthday party. The stakes held well in the ground and are pretty heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good design. If the horse shoe rings the yellow it topples over and the horseshoe goes over it. If the horse shoe leans on the yellow it pushes it over.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping kids busy outside!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 1/2 year old son as a "big brother" present. He LOVES it. Especially after seeing an episode of Sheriff Callie's Wild West on Disney Jr about playing horseshoes...he and his older brother (4) have been playing a lot of horseshoes this summer/fall. It was a definite hit in our house and worked well with grandparents visiting too.
customer_reviews.author: SelinaB5

customer_reviews.title: Great set for families!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game set for families with young kids. I bought this set for our little ones to learn on and they are lovin' it! The horseshoes are heavier than most plastic shoes I have seen, so they work well without being heavy enough to do damage if they hit the wrong thing. The only reason I didn't give this set 5-stars is that the pegs that are meant to go in the ground don't seem very strong. I'm not sure they would withstand being pushed into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Family

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a Middle School Field Day. Product held up. Couldn't have asked for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna buy some kind of 1/4 inch thick plastic to make a sturdy base. Other than that it will do
customer_reviews.text: The black THIN rubber base is not thick enough to stay upright when the horse shoe hits it. I'm gonna buy some kind of 1/4 inch thick plastic to make a sturdy base. Other than that it will do. Safe for indoors and safe for kids as well as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Michelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy as a gift, but great for yourself.
customer_reviews.text: This was okay, the boys had fun with it but the packaging is unmarked (just a plain white box) makes the product look cheap. If i bought it for myself, I wouldn't care but I bought it as a gift so I was a little unhappy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Shaku

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the family. Kids can use with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Tashem Jackson

product_meta.title: Champion Sports IHS1 Rubber Horseshoe Set
product_meta.description:
Fun for All Ages


The Champion Sports Rubber Horseshoe Set is made from lightweight rubber, making it easy to throw the horseshoes at the targets compared to heavier metal horseshoes. As well, the rubber design makes it safe for children to use as they learn proper throwing techniques, making this rubber horseshoe set a great activity for all ages. 

From the Backyard to the Gym
This horseshoe set includes rubber horseshoes and two rubber mats with center pegs, making it suitable for indoor or outdoor use. The horseshoes will not damage floors or walls if they miss the target, and the rubber mats are sure to stay grounded instead of sliding across smooth floors. A great activity to play in the gym, backyard, at the park, tailgating or camping, you can set up a game of horseshoes just about anywhere. 

Vibrant Colors for Added Visibility
With bright red and blue horseshoes and vibrant yellow pegs on the target, this rubber horseshoe game is designed for maximum visibility, both indoors and outdoors. The bright colors make it easy for players to see the horseshoes as they fly through the air, and the yellow peg helps players see the target so they can improve their accuracy. 

Quick and Convenient Set-Up
Easy to set up, this set includes everything needed to play a game of horseshoes, right out of the box. The rubber mats easily attach to the yellow plastic pegs, making it simple for players of all ages to set up a game in seconds. As well, the game tears-down with ease, making storing or transporting the game simple and convenient. Use this rubber horseshoe set in the backyard, in Phys. Ed. class or take it to your next tailgating party for a fun game anywhere.
feature_bullets: Rubber design for all ages: These Lightweight horseshoes are easy to throw and aim compared to traditional metal horseshoes, and their soft design also makes them safe to use for kids and adults

Indoor or outdoor play: Designed with lightweight rubber playing mats and horseshoes, this horseshoe game is suitable for indoor or outdoor use as it will not damage floors or walls during games and is sure to stay in place

Bright, vibrant colors: This horseshoe set comes with bright red and blue horseshoes along with vibrant yellow pegs, improving visibility for outdoor play and making it easier for players to see their target when throwing the horseshoes

Everything you need to play: With 4 horseshoes, 2 rubber mats with center pegs, and 2 red plastic dowels, this horseshoe set comes with everything needed to start a game in your backyard, on the playground, or in the gym
Quick, easy set up: Made to be easy and convenient to set up and tear-down, this horseshoe game is simple enough for anyone, including kids, to put together on their own right out of the box

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
